mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prjt_cnet_list( prjt_cnet_list_idx, usr_id, prjt_idx, cmpny_idx, prjt_cnet_list_idx_stus ) VALUES ( (nextval('public.prjt_cnet_list_seq')), #{usr_id}, #{prjt_idx}, #{cmpny_idx}, #{prjt_cnet_list_idx_stus} )
mapper.select: SELECT * from prjt_cnet_list ORDER BY prjt_cnet_list_idx DESC OFFSET #{prjt_cnet_list_offset}
SELECT * from prjt_cnet_list ORDER BY prjt_cnet_list_idx DESC OFFSET #{prjt_cnet_list_offset} LIMIT #{prjt_cnet_list_limit}
SELECT * from prjt_cnet_list WHERE prjt_idx = #{prjt_idx} ORDER BY prjt_cnet_list_idx DESC OFFSET #{prjt_cnet_list_offset} LIMIT #{prjt_cnet_list_limit}
